arts.ttl: Sheffield United win crucial Steel City derby to reach Championship summit
arts.sum: Sheffield United 1-0 Sheffield Wednesday: Rhian Brewster’s strike settled the match in favour of the Blades
Highlights of the Sky Bet Championship match between Sheffield Wednesday and Sheffield United.

arts.ttl: Brewster seals derby day win for Blades over Sheff Wed
arts.sum: Rhian Brewster earned Steel City derby spoils for Sheffield United as they earned a 1-0 victory over Sheffield Wednesday at Hillsborough to move level on points with Championship table toppers Leeds.

arts.ttl: Brewster’s goal wins Sheffield derby to put Blades level on points at the top
arts.sum: Rhian Brewster’s second-half goal proved to be the difference as Sheffield United edged a compelling Steel City derby with neighbours Sheffield Wednesday to move back into the Championship’s automatic promotion places. Chris Wilder’s side dropped out of the top two on Saturday courtesy of Burnley’s win at Swansea but the Blades responded in perfect fashion here against their great rivals. They are now level on points with the leaders Leeds and two points clear of Burnley after Brewster’s decisive strike. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Sheffield United win Steel City derby to draw level at Championship summit
arts.sum: Chris Wilder’s side leapfrogged Burnley to move level on points with leaders Leeds.
